:py:mod:`labtools.adtools.alternative.experimentbuilder`
========================================================

.. py:module:: labtools.adtools.alternative.experimentbuilder


Module Contents

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

.. py:class:: _Sequence(seq)

   Parent class of AD and barcode.

   .. py:method:: update()

      Report that the sequence was found again.


   .. py:method:: __eq__(other)

      Custom operator to compare equality of sequence objects.


   .. py:method:: __str__()

      When printing the object, show the sequence.


   .. py:method:: __lt__(other)

      Return self<value.


   .. py:method:: __gt__(other)

      Return self>value.


   .. py:method:: has_same_seq(other)


   .. py:method:: is_seq_in_list(_list)


   .. py:method:: merge(other)



.. py:class:: SeqList

   Bases: :py:obj:`list`

   List of sequence objects.

   .. py:method:: has_same_sequences(other)


   .. py:method:: __str__()

      Return str(self).



.. py:class:: Barcode(seq)

   Bases: :py:obj:`_Sequence`

   A short DNA sequence used to identify a read.

   .. py:method:: link_AD(AD)

      Add the barcode object to the list of associated barcodes.



.. py:class:: AD(seq)

   Bases: :py:obj:`_Sequence`

   A designed DNA tile attached to a transcription factor.

   .. py:method:: link_barcode(barcode)

      Add the barcode object to the list of associated barcodes.



.. py:class:: Sample(file, name, position, barcoded=True, event_count=100000)

   An individual sequencing sample (bin).

   .. py:method:: parse()

      Count tiles and assign barcodes in the sample.



.. py:class:: Experiment(name, num_bins)

   A group of samples from the same sort

   .. py:method:: add_sample(sample)

      Add a sample to the experiment.


   .. py:method:: normalize(data_in, bincounts=None)

      Normalize the read data.
